posts.body:
>>ed4da3e2-912f-4bb3-be52-c502a76f6d06
Okay, so, effectively, Pinning is saying "I will volunteer to seed everything currently in the board, but not anything posted in the future?"

Edit: Is that why I constantly see boards I've pinned get unpinned a few minutes later? Someone has posted something and there's now an image that I'm not seeding in the board?

>>57022e83-2067-4c25-bf99-d2dcf0452fd4
To add to this, what exactly does pinning ''do''? I have to pin boards every damned time I reload the page, it feels like.

>>70b9c31a-1d20-41d5-9487-3360702ffa06
The main menu, by the ZeroNet logo. Not the 8chan board list.

I keep thinking that, given how we're now on a site that is basically one gigantic torrent network, that there's got to be a way for us to just share files through the website itself. I don't know how that could be arranged, though, without requiring everybody to download and seed absolutely everything, even the things they don't want. Seems like there should be a way to share this stuff through 08chan directly but I don't understand this place well enough to know if it's actually possible.
